Name: organizationIdentifier
ValidationRules: OpenSSL 3.x native; format per ETSI EN 319 412-1

Name: basicConstraints
ValidationRules: Non-critical for EE certs; pathLen omitted

Name: keyUsage
ValidationRules: Critical; use nonRepudiation (not contentCommitment) for OpenSSL

Name: qcStatements
ValidationRules: Requires custom ASN.1 config section; see OpenSSL x509v3_config
